p: The genus Thymus from the Lamiaceae family contains many representatives. These plants, originating from the Mediterranean area, are commonly used for food, cosmetic, and medicinal purposes [ 1]. A thyme herb obtained from Thymus vulgaris L. and Thymus zygis L. is the most well-known herbal substance in the pharmaceutical industry. Nowadays, only standardized preparations of thyme herb and essential oil that meet the requirements of national pharmacopeias or European Pharmacopoeia X (Ph. Eur. X) are used for the production of medicines.
